title: Can't register to PBE after getting the email

embed.description: When i click on the buttom it gets me to the page to applicate to becoming a beta tester.. but i already received the email telling me I was accepted :/ That's weird.. My summoner's name is: Rose of Death, and my username is: 54ismael54 .

body:
Well look up the link that's my previous topic that no one answered xD

I can't register after logging at leagueoflegends.com and then clicking on the email's link.. it tells me Application received 0.o

replies.body:
You may have another account tied to this email address that received the invite instead. I'd try logging into any other accounts you have before visiting [this link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) to see if it was accepted.

Let me know if this helped!
Ah thanks!! I was my old account who got banned long ago xD That's why i never thought about testing this one lmao

Have you exited all the pages when you was doing the process that I described?
If so, then I have no idea.. Are you sure that you have logged in and then gone to your email and pressed the button? Because there shouldn't be a I Want to help button after you've pressed the link in the email.

Go to www.leagueoflegends.com then sign in at the account where you got accepted to the PBE. After that go back to your email and press the link (buttton).
Then you will get redirected to a page where you create a PBE account and download the pbe client..

Basically to order to be able to create an account you need to first log in to your league of legends account, then go back to your email and press the button to start the registration process.

I hope I helped you!

Best wishes, A Kat Main {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I've figured that part out but it seems like it bugged because when I pressed on "I want to help!" it redirected me to the step 2 and it says: "Application received" -_- But i've already do this like months before!! :/
